channel.title: Utorrent help
channel.description: Can some one please explain the thing about utorrent alot more, i have read the tutorial and i would like to know more about it if some one could leave there msn so i could ask some questions that would be great.

item.title: Utorrent help
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

naughty jef:

lil what do i give to other people? no ip thing??

Download and install no-ip.
Add a host
example: “ServerScape.no-ip.info”
Run no-ip
Portforward via uTorrent or your router (there are multiple tutorials on this)
Run your server.
Configure your client so it connects to your no-ip
.RAR your client and then upload it to a uploading site
example: megaupload, uppit, mediafire, iFile
Advertise on the server status page along with the link to your client.
If all else fails, your router probably cannot be portforwarded correctly without professional help

Read full topic

item.description:
@faze1one wrote:

[quote=“LilXCj, post:3, topic:351200”]Portforward via uTorrent.
Completely exit uTorrent (right clicking it’s tray icon and clicking exit)
Run your server
Open up uTorrent again[/quote]

i dont think he/she nos how to set it up, but like i said he need to be more specific
